title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and analyze the competition.

title: System Architecture Design for DreamDestinationSimulator
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the brain-computer interface (BCI), dream analysis algorithms, travel recommendation engine, data storage, and security considerations. The design should be scalable, secure, and efficient in handling large amounts of dream data, focusing on real-time processing capabilities for the BCI and seamless integration with the rest of the system components. This architecture should also comply with ethical and legal guidelines, taking into account privacy concerns related to user data. Incorporate machine learning techniques for dream analysis and recommendation algorithms. Specify interfaces for user interaction and feedback mechanisms. The design should be modular and flexible enough to accommodate future improvements or changes in technology. Consider using containerization technologies like Docker for scalability and portability, and Kubernetes for deployment management. To ensure the system's efficiency, implement caching mechanisms for frequently accessed data. For real-time data processing, consider utilizing stream processing technologies such as Apache Flink or Apache Storm. Incorporate monitoring tools like Prometheus and Grafana for performance monitoring. This RFC is ready for the next state, awaiting input from task-decomposer for breaking down the tasks into smaller, manageable units.

title: Brain-Computer Interface Development
description: Develop the hardware and software components for the brain-computer interface to record and interpret brain activity during sleep.

title: Dream Analysis Algorithm Development
description: Develop algorithms and machine learning models to analyze dream data and extract meaningful patterns and insights.

title: Travel Recommendation Engine Development
description: Develop the engine that matches dream analysis results with travel destinations and generates personalized recommendations.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the application, including dream recording, analysis visualization, and travel recommendations.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user data, dream recordings, analysis results, and travel recommendations.

title: Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate all components and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and deploy the application to production environments.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users, developers, and administrators. Establish user support channels and processes.
